title: thoongaa theeraviraajam
sahitya:
tungA tIravirAjam bhajamana rAghavEndra yatirAjam 

(tungA)



caraNam 1



mangaLakara mantrAlaya vAsam shrngArAnana vilasita hAsam

(tungA)



caraNam 2



kara dhrta daNDa kamaNDalu mAlam suruciracElam dhrtamaNi mAlam

(tungA)



caraNam 3



nirupama sundara kAya sushIlam vara kamalEshArayita nija

sakalam 

(tungA)
